Hi There:
     I'm new to Junit and i have just worked it out the sample program
which i find it very useful for unit and integration testing. I can see
all the benefits about using JUnit but I think there must be some
constraints behind it...:-). With my little knowledge of Junit and i
don't have much ideas of the JUnit contraints unless for those experts
like you has implemented it on an applications.
    Therefore,  it would be much appreciate if experts can provide me
the JUnit constraints which you have implemented using JUnit on an
application. This will guide me to certain extend JUnit can go before i
propose to my boss about using JUnit for testing framework.
     Once last question, is there any constraints on JUnit and Ant tools

?

Thanks,
